title: Tabua (Ribeira da)
body: It crosses the parish of Tábua in a north-south direction and flows into its coastline. It originates from the slopes of Pico das Pedras, on the edge of Paul da Serra, with the Barqueiro stream flowing into it.

Tábua: Parish crossed by Ribeira da Tábua in the north-south direction.
Paul da Serra: Location near the origin of Ribeira da Tábua.
Barqueiro: Tributary that flows into Ribeira da Tábua.
